title: Enchantress
description: Published as Spellbinder in the USLove was never so scary...The Night World is all around us - a secret society of vampires, werewolves, witches and creatures of darkness. They're beautiful - and deadly - and it's so easy to fall in love...Blaise is irresistible. She's lethal.She bewitches human boys for sport.Then she meets a boy who matters - to her cousin.They become rivals in love.It's Thea's white magic against Blaise's black magic.They're both breaking the rules.And Thea risks expulsion from the Night World...
author: L.J. Smith
